Experience Bali - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Experience Bali Bali, known as the "Island of the Gods," is one of the world's top holiday destinations, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, rich culture, and relaxing luxury. Visitors flock to Bali for its pristine beaches, lush rice terraces, and vibrant arts scene. Whether you're looking for a spiritual retreat in Ubud, a surfing adventure in Canggu, or a lively nightlife in Seminyak, Bali has something for everyone. The island is also home to stunning temples, friendly locals, and world-class dining and wellness experiences. With its warm climate and welcoming atmosphere, Bali makes for an unforgettable holiday year-round. Deal Details Travel Dates 10 Feb 2026 - 30 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 14, 2025 Priced From $639 Enquire Now Bali, known as the "Island of the Gods," is one of the world's top holiday destinations, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty, rich culture, and relaxing luxury. Visitors flock to Bali for its pristine beaches, lush rice terraces, and vibrant arts scene. Whether you're looking for a spiritual retreat in Ubud, a surfing adventure in Canggu, or a lively nightlife in Seminyak, Bali has something for everyone. The island is also home to stunning temples, friendly locals, and world-class dining and wellness experiences. With its warm climate and welcoming atmosphere, Bali makes for an unforgettable holiday year-round. Accommodation Blu-Zea Resort by Double Six (4 stars) Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six is a tropical oasis nestled in the heart of Seminyak. Surrounded by lush gardens, this stylish resort offers spacious rooms, a stunning lagoon pool, and a relaxed ambiance perfect for unwinding. Guests can enjoy delectable international cuisine, rejuvenating spa treatments, and a variety of recreational activities. With its prime location near Seminyak's vibrant shopping, dining, and beaches, Blu-Zea Resort promises an unforgettable escape for those visiting Bali. Rooms Superior Room (7 nights) 01 Mar - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $639.00 Bonus: Cold Towel & Refreshments upon arrival, 1x Shared Bucket of Beer, 1x 2 Course Set Menu Lunch at Beach Restaurant, 1x Set Menu Dinner at Pallas Greek Taverna Restaurant & Use of Departure Lounge Facilities Includes: Breakfast Daily Note: Airfares are additional. Blackout dates apply. 30 Mar-04 Apr 26. Features 7 nights accommodation Inclusions and bonuses as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Note: Airfares are additional Bali Dynasty Resort, Kuta (5 stars) Renowned for its warm Balinese hospitality, Bali Dynasty Resort is a premier beachside resort located in South Kuta and within an easy walk to the markets & shops. The resort offers a large variety of facilities including 6 restaurants and 5 bars, 4 swimming pools including a dedicated adults only pool, luxury Ashoka Spa and Kuta Beach area. With 313 guest rooms from Deluxe Rooms to Suites there is something to suit any traveller. Rooms Deluxe Room (7 nights) 26 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $685.00 Bonus: 1 x Theme Night Buffet Dinner at H2O Restaurant, 2 x 15 minute massages at Ashoka Spa, 1 x 1 Hour Padel Court Rental, 1 x Buy 1 Get 1 Free Love Bucket Cocktail at Oasis Restaurant & 1 x Buy 1 cocktail get the second free at D'Lounge Includes: Breakfast daily Note: Airfares are additional. Features 7 nights accommodation Inclusions and bonuses as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Note: Airfares are additional Pita Maha Resort & Spa (4 stars) Pita Maha Resort & Spa in Bali is a luxurious retreat nestled amidst lush rice terraces and the tranquil beauty of the Ubud jungle. Offering stunning views, traditional Balinese architecture, and private villas with plunge pools, this serene resort combines modern comfort with cultural authenticity. Guests can indulge in world-class spa treatments, dine in scenic settings, and explore nearby cultural attractions. Rooms Valley Suite (7 nights) 10 Feb - 29 Mar 26 Stay price: $985.00 Bonus: Stay 4 nights and receive 3 nights complimentary. Cultural visit to Ubud Royal Palace based on schedule, Campuhan Ridge morning walk based on schedule, 1x Admission ticket to Museum Puri Lukisa, 1x Dinner with Indonesian Set Menu Includes: Breakfast Daily Note: Airfares are additional. Features 7 nights accommodation Inclusions and bonuses as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Note: Airfares are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 08 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 08 October 2025 until 14 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: Airfares and transfers are additional. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply.Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
